lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We have a high degree of confidence that the western portion of the (Terra Nova) field contains at least 11 mln cubic meters of recoverable oil, or more than 70 mln barrels, and that we could produce it economicly using a floating production system," Petro-Canada said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Other field participants include Canterra Energy Ltd, Mobil Oil Canada Ltd, Gulf Canada Resources Inc, ICG Resources Ltd, Trillium Exploration Corp and general partnership PAREX.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We've had encouraging results from the eastern portion of the field, and we hope this summer's drilling will prove up additional reserves there," the company said.
